meanings.definition: A person who is considered to be sleazy or disreputable.
meanings.sent1: That scuzzball always hangs out in dark alleys.
meanings.sent2: The scuzzball tried to scam me out of my money.
meanings.sent3: The scuzzball thought wearing sunglasses indoors made him look cool.
meanings.sent4: The scuzzball's shadow seemed to slink away from the light.
meanings.sent5: The scuzzball's greasy hair and shifty eyes made everyone uneasy.

meanings.definition: To behave in a sleazy or disreputable manner.
meanings.sent1: Don't scuzzball your way through life; be honest and kind.
meanings.sent2: He tends to scuzzball when he thinks no one is watching.
meanings.sent3: She scuzzballed her way into getting free drinks all night.
meanings.sent4: The politician scuzzballs his way out of every scandal.
meanings.sent5: The con artist scuzzballed his victims with smooth talk and false promises.
